title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Local structures in oxide glasses, Radial distribution functions and analysis, Structural units and groups, Distribution of vibrational, rotational and electronic levels, Infrared and Raman spectra of oxide glasses, Normal coordinate analysis, Electronic absorption and emission in doped optical glasses, Group theory and selections rules for vibrational and electronic transitions, Ligand field and molecular orbital theories, Long lasting phosphor and applications, Life-time of emitting state, Concentration quenching, Radiative and nonradiative processes, Charge-transfer bands, Energy-transfer bands, Controlled electron-phonon interactions in doped optical glasses and nanocrystallites, Electron paramagnetic resonance (EPR): line shape analysis for vitreous and devitrified glasses with nanocrystallites, EPR in impurities and structural defects, Nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR): line shape analysis, Relaxation spectroscopy, Photonics
